token.aboutMeText: Hi, I'm Thomas currently working as a FullStackDeveloper in a big company and completed my studies in Software Design & Engineering in 2020 at the University of Applied Science Campus Vienna. I also love to develop my own software projects in my spare time which are published on the internet or in the App Stores.
